title: Transfer Budget Funds
description: A department head needs to transfer funds from one budget line item (e.g., travel) to another (e.g., office supplies) within their department's budget.

tasks.description: Identify the source and destination budget line items and the amount to be transferred.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager specifies the details of the transfer.

tasks.description: Verify that the department head is authorized to make such a transfer and that sufficient funds are available.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms the user's permissions and the available balance.

tasks.description: Process the budget transfer in the financial system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system successfully moves the funds between the two budget lines.
